entry.title: voca (colloqual, words)
entry.content:
colloqual

a mass of
dozens of
tons of
umpteen
a scrap of
I gather
Incidentally

in excess of
somewhere in the region of
or so
dash
stacks of
or whatever
and things like that / and that kind of thing.
something along those lines
or words to that effect

Mumble
mutter
slagging off
whining
chatting away
winding him up
get tongue-tied

words

86
overhang
overshadowed
undermine
proliferate

guilt-ridden
crime-ridden
bedridden

upend
end up
uphold
hold up
outdo
do out
outrun
run out
upset
set up
entry.summary: colloqual a mass of dozens of tons of umpteen a scrap of I gather Incidentally in excess of somewhere in the region of or so dash stacks of or whatever and things like that / and that kind of thing. something along those lines or words to that effect Mumble mutter slagging off whining chatting away winding him up get tongue-tied words 86 overhang overshadowed undermine proliferate guilt-ridden crime-ridden bedridden upend end up uphold hold up outdo do out outrun run out upset set up

entry.title: voca (metaphore)
entry.content:
metaphore

formidable
dismal
ludicrous

be on the ball
rule of thumb
dim
trickling

threw me completely
got our wires crossed
I’m not with you. / You’ve lost me there
to be fed up to the back teeth

Come over
put forward
come off
come under
stay on
dwell on
catch on
going on
brush up on
laid off
thrown himself into
entry.summary: metaphore formidable dismal ludicrous be on the ball rule of thumb dim trickling threw me completely got our wires crossed I’m not with you. / You’ve lost me there to be fed up to the back teeth Come over put forward come off come under stay on dwell on catch on going on brush up on laid off thrown himself into

entry.content:

through rose-tinted spectacles
pangs
rue

dissent

negate
thereby

scribble

touch-type

entry.title: voca (communication)
entry.content:
agree

assent countenance endorse clamp down veto

complain

I’ve just about had enough of this is just not on I’m not at all satisfied with I wish to complain about I take great exception to I really must object to grouse *

apology

phoney * alibi flimsy pretext remorse acquitted armistice accord ceasefire

compliment

back-handed compliment double-edged compliment pay tribute to ovation extol plaudit laud

promise

promise someone the earth/moon oath / to swear swears by pledge vowed wager
entry.summary: agree assent countenance endorse clamp down veto

entry.title: voca (cause, compare, difficulty, opinions, statistics)
entry.content:
cause

precipitated *
brought about
has implications for



compare

affinity *
akin to
To use a sporting analogy *
to equate
tantamount to *



difficulty

a snag, a hitch, a glitch. Glitch *
pitfall *
ordeal *
abstruse *
arduous *
convoluted *
gruelling *
insufferable *
wayward *
What’s eating him
What’s bugging him
to slog *
to grind *
to graft *
to flog yourself to death *
in a fix * / in a spot * / in a hole / up against it * / up to your neck
out of the wood(s) *

opinions

The odds are
The odds are against
are bound to
There’s every likelihood

statustics

twofold
quadrupled
by a factor of
revised upwards *
deviated from the norm *
seesawed
erratic
blip
flawed
cautious *
entry.summary: cause precipitated * brought about has implications for

entry.title: voca (Manner, Sense)
entry.content:
Motion


limp
stagger
lurch *
tiptoe
stride
tramp
trample
trudge
limped to a conclusion
staggered
Maria takes everything that life throws at her in her stride. [takes … calmly]
unprecedented

Manner

insolent *
etiquette
stand on ceremony
straitlaced
the done thing
netiquette
twitch
flinch *
squirm *
smirk *
beam
sniff at something
snort

Sounds

squeaking *
pounding
creaked
sizzled
rang out
eerie
deafening *
you could have heard a pin drop
I can’t hear myself think

Weight

weighed down
weigh up
weighed out
weighing on me
weighed in
sift * 체로 걸러내다
dilute
impervious *



speed

nip
dart
whizz
zip
bolt
scamper, scurry, scuttle
tumble (finantial)
crawl, creep
entry.summary: Motion limp stagger lurch * tiptoe stride tramp trample trudge limped to a conclusion staggered Maria takes everything that life throws at her in her stride. [takes … calmly] unprecedented Manner insolent * etiquette stand on ceremony straitlaced the done thing netiquette twitch flinch * squirm * smirk * beam sniff at something snort Sounds squeaking * pounding creaked sizzled rang out eerie deafening * you could have heard a pin drop I can’t hear myself think Weight weighed down weigh up weighed out weighing on me weighed in sift * 체로 걸러내다 dilute impervious *

entry.title: voca (Technology, space, time)
entry.content:
technology

ergonomics



foresee
envisage *
gulf

onshore offshore
gas-guzzler *
food miles

space

rambling
poky
hemmed in
bustling *
labyrinth *
stuff them all in

time

once in a bluemoon
all his born days
in a mo
in a tick
in a jiffy
for donkey’s years / since the year dot.
till the cows come home
for keeps / for good
in the nick of time *
over the hill / past it
was already a has-been
in a flash / at a rate of knots
fleeting *
lengthy
inexorable
incipient
protracted *

entry.title: voca (Health, Industry)
entry.content:
Health


ophthalmologists (eyes),
cardiologists (heart),
psychiatrists (the mind),
dermatologists (skin),
gynaecologists (women’s reproductive systems),
obstetricians (pregnancy and childbirth),
paediatricians (children),
anaesthetists (anaesthesia or stopping people from feeling pain during surgery)
prescription charge

off-colour
out of sorts *
fighting off
cuts and bruises
stinging *
throbbing *
feverish
nauseous
on the mend
be back on her feet *

low-dose
bowel
adverse reactions
stools
disorientation
prognosis *
a rash of *
jaundiced * 황달?
infect 전염?

clog
cholesterol
cardiovascular
brisk walking
scored an own goal
moving the goalposts
level playing field
neck and neck
skate around
sailed through



Industry

inward investment
on piecework.
zero hours contracts
Child labour
sweatshops
switch production
entry.summary: Health ophthalmologists (eyes), cardiologists (heart), psychiatrists (the mind), dermatologists (skin), gynaecologists (women’s reproductive systems), obstetricians (pregnancy and childbirth), paediatricians (children), anaesthetists (anaesthesia or stopping people from feeling pain during surgery) prescription charge

entry.title: voca (Finance, Media)
entry.content:
Finance


I’m rolling in it
to make ends meet
Things are a bit tight
I was strapped for cash
it bounced
Who shall I make this cheque out to / payable to?
lump sum *
golden handshake

Media

editorial
leaflet
brochure
pamphlet
prospectus
flyer
booklet

instant messaging
screen out / filter out

leave other dishwashers standing.
put/leave other courses in the shade.
Rock-bottom *
slashed *
Enjoy a sumptuous meal in opulent surroundings *
Live in the lap of luxury for two weeks
glossy *
radiant *
sandwich boards
plug

air their views
rag
gutter press
exclusive/scoop 특종
run a story 게재하다
libel *
put their own gloss/spin on a story.
muck-raking
occurrence
entry.summary: Finance I’m rolling in it to make ends meet Things are a bit tight I was strapped for cash it bounced Who shall I make this cheque out to / payable to? lump sum * golden handshake Media editorial leaflet brochure pamphlet prospectus flyer booklet instant messaging screen out / filter out leave other dishwashers standing. put/leave other courses in the shade. Rock-bottom * slashed * Enjoy a sumptuous meal in opulent surroundings * Live in the lap of luxury for two weeks glossy * radiant * sandwich boards plug air their views rag gutter press exclusive/scoop 특종 run a story 게재하다 libel * put their own gloss/spin on a story. muck-raking occurrence
